text: Igor Rostislavovich Shafarevich (; 3 June 1923 - 19 February 2017) was a Russian mathematician. He contributed to algebraic number theory and algebraic geometry. He also wrote books and articles which criticise socialism. He was an important dissident during the Soviet regime. He was born in Zhytomyr, Ukraine. Shafarevich died on 19 February 2017 in Moscow, at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Igor Shafarevich at The MacTutor History of Mathematics Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Foreign Members of the Royal Society Category:Soviet dissidents Category:Russian geometers Category:Russian Orthodox Christians Category:Number theorists Category:Algebraic geometers Category:Zhytomyr Oblast
